body:
Hey guys, back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Today's spotlightee is Xuph!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
 My IGN is Xuph and my favorite gamemode is CTW

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Hi i am Xuph however most people call me by my name - Eric. I enjoy playing on Avicus on the team Apollo as an offender. Outside of Avicus I enjoy building as well and I am a builder on Badlion and Sarefine. I've been on Avicus for 4 years now and I like the server.

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
In mc - my ocn team and building, but really nothing too much, in irl obviously school - trying to succeed and get good grades

What interests you the most in life?
Questions that people don't actually know the answer for for example how does the brain work and etc. Generally stuff that are really unknown and not yet understandable very well

​What music/art/media do you like?
I like RnB, EDM, Trap and honestly any kind of genre as long as I enjoy it, cant really explain
I like horror movies and action movies

​Where are you from?
Israel

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
Building or just scrimming

​Anything else you want to mention?
unban seuthy already {tag=89f514e1f0f549778ddc77ef030a8b46}

title: Community Spotlight #16 - Xuph

replies.body:
How the brain works ^

Only new thing I learnt is that you're a builder on badlion and sarefine :p
